articles.title: Ben R. Goldstein
articles.description: Ecology PhD candidate at UC Berkeley
articles.contents: I am a Ph.D.Â candidate in the Department of Environmental Science, Policy, and Management (ESPM) at UC Berkeley. I study quantitative ecology with a focus on species distribution modeling, developing and applying statistical methods to understand how wild animal populations vary over time and space. My advisor is Perry de Valpine.
